_header: Jesu Christ Gods Son of heaven
Subjects: fifteen, O’s of Christ; Christ, fifteen O’s
_description: The Fifteen O’s — seventy-three quatrains, and an Invocation of twelve quatrains, and an Epilogue of six lines

BodAddB66.First Lines:
Ihesu crist godis sone of heueneBoþe god & man I borne of
                    a mayWe pray þe all wiþ mylde steueneThat oure prayeris
                    plese þe þis day…
BodAddB66.Last Lines:
…Grant hem alle þi benysounIhesu crist godis
                    sone
